column4: I'm doing a Ubuntu server install, from the specialized server CD.  From what I've read on the Ubuntu users mailing-list it sounds like /WEBMIN/ is a good tool for administration.  ( Is there any better / preferred alternatives? )  Will /LINKS/ be sufficient to access webmin on Localhost or is there another console web-browser better suited?
webmin as u can install it from the repos or direct from webmin.com will have to be tweaked for almost all modules. but once it's done you'll be fine
what kind of server do u want?
u'd be better off doing all that by hand then and using firestarter (if u have 2 cards) for firewall
